definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary

sentences.english: No spalled paint exists at the plug weld and for a short distance each side of the plug welds .
sentences.chinese: 在塞焊焊縫處及塞焊周圍距離內無細漆碎屑存在。

sentences.english: There are two kinds of reserviors consisting of clastics and carbonates in Yakela Black.
sentences.chinese: 雅克拉斷凸儲層主要有碎屑岩和碳酸鹽巖兩大類。

sentences.english: Clastic facies pattern recognition is somewhat systematic .
sentences.chinese: 碎屑岩相模式的識別是帶有一定系統性的。

sentences.english: Aim To study the secondary porosity in the clastic rock storage of Ordos Basin.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究鄂爾多斯盆地碎屑岩儲集體中的次生孔隙。

sentences.english: No information as to the size of particles generated was published.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人報道磨損產生的碎屑顆粒大小。

sentences.english: Flooding or additional slides may occur after a landslide or mudflow.
sentences.chinese: 滑坡或泥石流結束後可能會有洪水或其他的碎屑。

sentences.english: Thin layers of sandy shale, and carbonaceous fragments are locally present.
sentences.chinese: 局部出現砂質頁岩薄層和碳質碎屑。

sentences.english: The " Deep Impact" made the powdery fragments on the surface of the comet nucleus splash in all directions.
sentences.chinese: “深度撞擊”使彗核表面的細粉狀碎屑四處飛濺。

sentences.english: White phosphorus fragments smoldered and hissed in the snow.
sentences.chinese: 白磷彈碎屑在積雪悶燃或嘶嘶燃燒。

sentences.english: Oil and gas accumulation in Guang'an is a hot point of oil and gas exploration in Sichuan at present.
sentences.chinese: 廣安地區碎屑岩油氣藏是目前勘探開發的熱點。

sentences.english: Expanded metal grid to prevent bag pieces from getting into the system.
sentences.chinese: 鋼板網防止碎屑進入產品。

sentences.english: Pyroclastic flows are some of the most fearsome hazards posed by erupting volcanoes.
sentences.chinese: 火山碎屑流是由火山噴發而引起的最可怕自然災害。

sentences.english: All debris and detached epidermis must be removed .
sentences.chinese: 一切碎屑和分離的老皮必須清除。

sentences.english: Clastic and evaporite rocks were deposited in the Hetaoyuan Formation.
sentences.chinese: 在覈桃園組沉積了碎屑和蒸發巖。

sentences.english: The fractal dimension D value of clastics distribution is different under different confining pressure tests.
sentences.chinese: 不同圍壓的實驗中，碎屑分佈的分維值不同。

sentences.english: These active ingredients are beneficial for treating flaky scalps and dandruff.
sentences.chinese: 這些活性成分有助於減少頭皮碎屑和頭皮屑的發生。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
